item.description:
Come join us for the May Saturday meetup!

As a reminder we meet every second Sunday and every fourth Saturday in the small fenced in area of Peter's Park. If anyone is interested in trying some new venues please let me know. I have considered the Fells but the parking is a bear on weekends. Please email me with your suggestions. As we get further into the Summer-it might make sense to meet in the evening on weeknights (heat and vacations). Again, email me with preferences.

Also, I want to reach out to get some asst. organizers on board to organize in areas outside of Boston. Let me know if you are interested.

Another note: Simon passed yesterday peacefully. He will be terribly missed by Louie and myself. He loved this group very much though his poor behavior over the past few months was due to his disease (finally explained). Thank you all for your kind words.

So we will cancel if it rains-I'll email the group by 8 AM. Otherwise, Louie and I will see you there.
About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the smaller fenced in area-I'll be wearing a Lei

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston French Bulldog May Saturday Meetup
